Below are the primary service buckets and typical engagement models I offer. If you don't see exactly what you need, I usually tailor a small pilot to prove value quickly.
#### Data & BI Executive dashboards, KPI design, forecasting, automation, and decision plumbing for executive teams.
#### GIS & Location Intelligence Site selection, territory design, drive-time & catchment analysis, and network optimization.
#### Satellite & Remote Sensing Change detection, asset monitoring, land-cover classification, NDVI & index time-series, and coastal risk analysis.
#### Custom Modeling Demand scoring, risk heatmaps, suitability analysis, scenario planning, and automated monitoring pipelines.
### Engagement models
#### Discovery Sprint (2–3 weeks) Audit of data, quick wins, and a short roadmap with an actionable prototype.
#### Project Delivery (4–8 weeks) Scoped outcome: a dashboard, report, or monitoring workflow delivered end-to-end.
#### Monitoring (Monthly) Ongoing updates, alerts, and feature improvements to keep the solution current.
::: {.cta-row} ::: {.cta-left} [Request a proposal](contact.qmd){.btn .btn-primary} ::: :::
## Industries served I work across sectors where location, risk, and change matter. Below are common examples and short mini-cases.
### Energy & Utilities Map corridor routing and encroachment risk around critical assets. Prioritise maintenance with satellite-detected change. _Mini case: Pipeline Corridor Risk Mapping_ — combined easement data, SAR change alerts, and field tickets to flag hotspots.
### Real Estate & Retail Score sites with demand, drive-time, and competition. Design territories to reduce cannibalisation and improve coverage. _Mini case: Multi-Site Expansion Playbook_ — tract scoring and trade-area maps delivered as an executive shortlist.
### Logistics & Mobility Optimize territories and routes to lower miles and stabilise ETAs. Visualise service coverage for capacity planning. _Mini case: Distributor Territory Redesign_ — rebalanced zones and removed route overlap with clear KPIs.
### Environmental & Coastal Monitor shoreline change and wetlands with time-series remote sensing and produce compliance-ready reporting. _Mini case: Coastal Erosion Monitoring Pilot_ — NDWI/NDVI trends with an alerting dashboard.
### Agriculture Map crop health and variability (NDVI anomalies) and delineate yield zones for targeted interventions. _Mini case: Field Variability Mapping_ — Sentinel-2 indices guiding in-field checks and inputs.
### Insurance & Finance Portfolio exposure mapping with hazard overlays and event monitoring for rapid triage. _Mini case: Portfolio Exposure Heatmaps_ — unified parcel-level risk layers for underwriting reviews.
::: {.cta-row} ::: {.cta-left} [Request a proposal](contact.qmd){.btn .btn-primary} ::: :::
